body_html:
It actually works. Here are the steps:

  • Add export MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET="10.12" to build_all_ios.sh, otherwise you'll get a linker error (see above).
  • Insert -fembed-bitcode \ in compile_ios_protobuf.sh and Makefile below the -arch lines
  • Run build_all_ios.sh

You now have a working TF bitcode enabled iOS build.
body_text:
It actually works. Here are the steps:

Add export MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET="10.12" to build_all_ios.sh, otherwise you'll get a linker error (see above).
Insert -fembed-bitcode \ in compile_ios_protobuf.sh and Makefile below the -arch lines
Run build_all_ios.sh

You now have a working TF bitcode enabled iOS build.
body:
It actually works. Here are the steps:

- Add `export MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET="10.12"` to `build_all_ios.sh`, otherwise you'll get a linker error (see above).
- Insert `-fembed-bitcode \` in `compile_ios_protobuf.sh` and `Makefile` below the `-arch` lines
- Run `build_all_ios.sh`

You now have a working TF bitcode enabled iOS build.
